SummaryEnglish: Lamune and Da Cider head off to Puff-Puff Palace to rescue two beautiful barely clothed maidens, Gold Mountain and Silver Mountain- the Mountain Duo. This of course infuriates Milk and Leska, who with a rather confused and unwilling Cocoa "transform" into "Seinaru Milky", "Seinaru Cacao", and "Seinaru Lemon". The three then head after their would-be boyfriends to extract their revenge.
Aliases: NG Knight Ramune & 40 DX: Wakuwaku Jikuu - Honoo no Daisousasen

1.TitleEnglish: Passionate Pursuit in Wakuwaku Space-time - Warriors of Love, Begin a New Journey!

2.TitleEnglish: Passionate Pursuit in Wakuwaku Space-time - Warriors of Love, Travel to the Past!

3.TitleEnglish: Passionate Pursuit in Wakuwaku Space-time - Warriors of Love, Be Eternal!
